note.p: Birth: Thurold Township, near Belleville, Ontario, Canada (20 November 1892)
Career: Professor of Biochemistry, McGill University
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1973 vol 19 pp 235-267, plate, by M L Barr and R J Rossiter
References: D C Martin, 'Visit by the Assistant Secretary to some North American Scientific Institutions' in NR 1952 vol 9 pp 356-364
